titleStmt.title: The heroine musqueteer: or, the female warrier A true history: very delightful, and full of pleasant adventures in the campagnes of 1676, & 1677. Translated out of French.
Héroïne mousquetaire. English
titleStmt.author: Préchac, Jean de, 1647?-1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for James Mages and Richard Bentley, in Russel-street in Covent-Garden, near the Piazza's, and Richard Tonson near Grays-In-Gate in Grays-In-Lane,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Préchac, Jean de. L'héroine mousquetaire.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
Identified by ESTC as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) P3206.

place.placeName: Russel-street in Covent-Garden, near the Piazza's
